Package com.receiver2d.engine

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Console
    This class is used for logging and debug information
    DisplayHandler  
    Geometry
    Deals with analyzing collisions between geometric figures in two-dimensional space.
    Receiver2D
    This is the main class, where the engine can be started and managed.
    Renderer
    In this class we abstract all drawing functions.
    RenderThread
    Is responsible for everything that is "seen," that is, everything that involves OpenGL draw calls.
    TestClass
    This class is for testing purposes only, although it currently is responsible for initializing Receiver2D.
    Transform2D
    This abstract class deals with all entities/objects that are translatable in two-dimensional space.
    UpdateThread
    The main thread responsible for updating all of the logic in-game.
    Vector2D
    Contains point data (x, y).
